tvdb: Jack asks Chris to break the rules regarding Tess, as Ian runs more tests, but Ian tells Jack he'll keep Tess's secret. Tess has more flashbacks of Livvie. Elizabeth nervously treats Rafe's bleeding finger. Alison tells Stephen her mother tried to con her out of her inheritance. Stephen gives Elizabeth more of his special juice.  Per Stephen's request, Elizabeth rips up her contract with Ali to rebuild their relationship. Kevin tells Lucy he's been released from the hospital.  She's happy to see him but is still frightened & he vows to earn back her trust. Alone, he calls his doctor, saying Lucy has no idea he's changed.
